description:
My love for Leonardo DiCaprio films has been reignited last year. 去年，我对Leonardo DiCaprio电影的兴趣又被重新点燃了。

At the time of writing this, I am yet to see 'Wolf of Wall Street' but I am absolutely dying to.现在，我虽然还没有来得及看《华尔街之狼》，但是我已经等不及了。

This love has come from The Great Gatsby.这种爱来源于《了不起的盖茨比》这部电影。

Over the course of his career, there has been many Leonardo DiCaprio films that are well worth a watch.在Leonardo DiCaprio的职业生涯中，有许多值得一看的电影。

1. TITANIC

Of course, the most famous of all the Leonardo DiCaprio films is Titanic.当然了，Leonardo DiCaprio最著名的电影就是《泰坦尼克号》了。

Playing ill-fated Jack, he was destined to die of hypothermia after bravely giving up a floating plank of wood to Rose.他在其中饰演了一个叫做Jack的命途多舛的人，在将唯一的一条浮木让给了Rose之后，他由于体温过低而死去。

Before his death, he saves her from suicide, teaches her how to spit, and makes an amazingly fast get away from a steamy sex session in a car.在他死前，他将她从自杀边缘拉回，教她吐痰，并且在两人在一辆老爷车中亲热后带着她迅速离开。

What makes us love Jack even more is the fact that Rose's fiance is an absolute douche.让我们更加喜欢Jack的原因是，Rose的未婚夫是个彻头彻尾的大傻瓜。

经典片段欣赏

经典对白

You jump, I jump.你跳我就跳。

To make each day count.要让每一天都有所值。

You are going to get out of there.You're going to on and you're going to make lots of babies and you're going to watch them grow and you're going to die and old, an old lady, warm in your bed. Not there, Not this night, Not like this .你一定会脱险的，你要活下去，生很多孩子，看着他们长大，你会安享晚年，安息在温暖的床上，而不是今晚在这里，不是象这样的死去。

Winning that ticket, Rose, was the best thing that ever happened to me... it brought me to you. And I'm thankful for that, Rose. I'm thankful. You must do me this honor, Rose. Promise me you'll survive. That you won't give up, no matter what happens, no matter how hopeless. Promise me now, Rose, and never let go of that promise.赢得船票……是我一生最幸运的事，让我可认识你，认识你真荣幸，万分荣幸，你一定要帮我，答应我活下去，答应我，你不会放弃……无论发生什么事，无论环境怎样……Rose，答应我，千万别忘了。

I'll never let go. I'll never let go, Jack.我永不食言，永不食言，Jack。

title: Leonardo的荧幕经典系列之一 泰坦尼克号
